metadata.title: CVE-2017-1000480 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Smarty 3 before 3.1.32 is vulnerable to a PHP code injection when callingfetch() or display() functions on custom resources that does not sanitizetemplate name.

criterions.comment: smarty3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
